bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology-Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX®)--IEEE Draft Technical Standard: Base Specifications, Issue 7
IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology-Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX®)--IEEE Draft Technical Standard: Base Specifications, Issue 7
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1003.1 Draft 5.1, May 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: POSIX.1-200x defines a standard operating system interface and environment, including a command interpreter (or "shell"), and common utility programs to support applications portability at the source code level. POSIX.1-200x is intended to be used by both application developers and system implementors and comprises four major components (each in an associated volume)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
